alert.note: Alert for Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 11 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following county, Sumter. * WHEN...Until 915 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... York, Cuba, Kinterbish, Coatopa, Ward, Old Mallard Airport, Bellamy, Lilita, Whitfield and I 20 Welcome Center At Cuba.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
